topic.title: Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Existence (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Existence (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1578956323"/> <code code="67799-7" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Cardiac Arrest Section"/> <title>EMS Cardiac Arrest Event</title> <text/> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1965737881"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="ASSERTION"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <informant typeCode="INF"> <relatedEntity classCode="AGNT"> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> </relatedEntity> </informant> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"> <observation/> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entry> </section>
